冥冥之中.definition: in the unseen world of spirits; mysteriously and inexorably

冥合.definition: to agree implicitly; of one mind; views coincide without a word exchanged

冥婚.definition: posthumous or ghost marriage (in which at least one of the bride and groom is dead)

冥幣.definition: false paper money burned as an offering to the dead

冥思苦想.definition: to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard; to rack one's brains

冥思苦索.definition: to mull over (idiom); to think long and hard

冥紙.definition: joss paper made to resemble paper money

冥道.definition: the gateway to the ghost world

冥鈔.definition: false paper money burned as an offering to the dead

冥錢.definition: joss paper made to resemble paper money
